column4: To retain my livelyhood I have investigated many ways of getting past the restrictions set upon me by my sadistic gateway server... however as it has been a perilous journey, my troubles do not seem to end so easily...
NO! Not at all. The machine will be the end of me! DAMN YOU SANDVINE!! DAMN YOU TO HELL!!!!
if you are being restricted at university, contact the admins of the network. We're not hot on helping you bypass it here.
You take the fun out of everything man, grow a sense of humor.
